header_text: You are giving a presentation during your evening meeting. As you talk, you hear a few of your coworkers laughing in the corner. You look over at them and realize they were probably laughing at you.

elements.text: After a moment, you remember situations where you and your coworkers have laughed about things unrelated to who is speaking. You move on from their laughter and complete your presentation...

elements.name: You are giving a presentation during your evening meeting. As you talk, you hear a few of your coworkers laughing in the corner. You look over at them and realize they were probably laughing at you._Social Situations_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
